mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.status, p.views, p.imageUrl, -- 게시글의 좋아요 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Likes l WHERE l.post_id = p.id) AS likeCount, -- 게시글의 댓글 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Comments c WHERE c.post_id = p.id) AS commentCount FROM Posts p WHERE p.id = #{id}
